SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet

Class Context

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.Context
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparator<org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.WebFragment>, javax.servlet.ServletContext, Description, ManagerContextService, SessionContext
public class Context extends Object implements ManagerContextService, SessionContext, Comparator<org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.WebFragment>
The application context represents the single point of contact for all servlets and associated data in the application.
Author:
Chris Burdess

  • Constructor Details

    • Context

      public Context()
      No-arg constructor for dependency injection. After construction, call setContainer(Container), setPath(String), setRoot(File), then load().

    • Context

      public Context(Container container, String contextPath, File root)

  • Method Details

    • setContainer

      public void setContainer(Container container)
      Sets the container for this context. Must be called before load() when using the no-arg constructor.
      Parameters:
      container - the parent container

    • setPath

      public void setPath(String path)
      Sets the context path for this context. Must be called before load() when using the no-arg constructor.
      Parameters:
      path - the context path (e.g., "" for root, "/app" for an application)

    • setRoot

      public void setRoot(File root)
      Sets the root directory for this context. Must be called before load() when using the no-arg constructor.
      Parameters:
      root - the root directory or WAR file

    • getResource

      public URL getResource(String path) throws MalformedURLException
      This will return a resource: URL. You can open a connection to this URL to see its size and date and read its contents. If you just want to read the contents, use @link #getResourceAsStream(String) as this is more efficient.
      Specified by:
      getResource in interface javax.servlet.ServletContext
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the resource within this context
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException

    • parseJSPFile

      public javax.servlet.Servlet parseJSPFile(String path)
      Parses a JSP file and returns a compiled Servlet instance.

      This method uses in-memory compilation for better performance, eliminating the need for temporary files on disk. It also tracks dependencies to enable incremental compilation.

      Parameters:
      path - the resource path to the JSP file in the context
      Returns:
      a compiled Servlet instance
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if parsing, compilation, or loading fails

    • jspNeedsRecompilation

      public boolean jspNeedsRecompilation(String path)
      Checks if a JSP file needs recompilation.
      Parameters:
      path - the JSP file path
      Returns:
      true if the JSP needs recompilation

    • invalidateJSP

      public Set<String> invalidateJSP(String path)
      Invalidates a JSP file and any files that depend on it. Called when a file is modified (e.g., by hot deployment).
      Parameters:
      path - the path that was modified
      Returns:
      set of JSP files that need recompilation
